readable.title: 3679407035_708774de34
readable.content: A brown haired man is wearing a blue shirt that says , " Boys will do boys " . A man is wearing a blue shirt that is rolled up above his abdomen . A young man , bearing his midriff , and other people are gathered in a city street . Man wearing boys will do boys shirt waves at camera during gay pride parade There is a man who is wearing a shredded blue shirt that reads , " Boys Will Do Boys , " waving at the camera .
